Class BankTransferController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.openclassrooms.paymybuddy.controller.BankTransferController
  • @Controller
@Validated
public class BankTransferController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller Class for managing bank transfer between user and bank account.

      • getInfoById

        @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ADMIN\')")
@GetMapping("/banktransfers")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.data.domain.Page<BankTransferDto>> getInfoById​(org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
        Handle HTTP GET request on all bank transfers. Reserved to admin.
        Parameters:
        pageable - of the requested page
        Returns:
        HTTP 200 with bank transfers page

      • getInfoById

        @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ADMIN\') or #id == authentication.principal.userId")
@GetMapping("/banktransfers/user")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.data.domain.Page<BankTransferDto>> getInfoById​(@RequestParam
                                                                                                                  int id,
                                                                                                                  org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
                                                                                                           throws ResourceNotFoundException
        Handle HTTP GET request on all bank transfers of a user.
        Parameters:
        id - of the user
        pageable - of the requested page
        Returns:
        HTTP 200 Response with bank transfers page
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException - if user not found

      • request

        @PreAuthorize("#request.userId == authentication.principal.userId")
@PostMapping("/banktransfers")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<BankTransferDto> request​(@Valid @RequestBody
                                                                        @Valid BankTransferDto request)
                                                                 throws ForbiddenOperationException,
                                                                        ResourceNotFoundException
        Handle HTTP POST request for a bank transfer.
        Parameters:
        request - of the transfer
        Returns:
        HTTP Response 201 with transfer performed
        Throws:
        InsufficientProvisionException - if provision insufficient to perform transfer
        ResourceNotFoundException - if account not found
        ForbiddenOperationException
